settings.text: LOOKING TO FURTHER YOUR CAREER IN FASHION?

settings.content: The Calexico Universe encompasses many fantastic roles and career opportunities from customer facing positions through to head office roles within ecommerce, buying and creative. We are proud that so many of our Calexico alum go on to take the global fashion industry by-storm, having been provided the training,encouragement, and opportunities here to refine their craft and develop a fantastic database of customers and colleagues alike.

Part-Time & Full-Time | Brisbane (James Street)

Love fashion? Love sales? At Calexico, we create unforgettable shopping experiences — and we’re looking for confident, client-focused Stylists to join our team.

Your role is simple: help clients look and feel their best while driving sales. You’ll work with both appointments and walk-in clients, building loyal relationships that bring them back time and again. When you’re not with clients, you’ll be learning about new product arrivals, following up with past clients, and finding creative ways to grow your client list.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Deliver an exceptional, personalised styling experience that inspires and sells.
  • Build long-term relationships with clients to drive repeat business and referrals.
  • Proactively connect with past clients to invite them back in-store.
  • Keep the store looking its best — from the shop floor to the fitting rooms.
  • Learn and share product knowledge to offer expert advice and close sales.

About You

  • You’re confident, approachable, and passionate about luxury fashion.
  • You love sales and thrive in a target-driven environment.
  • You build rapport easily and take pride in remembering client preferences.
  • You have a strong eye for style and attention to detail.

Join us and be part of a team where style meets service — and every day is an opportunity to connect, create, and sell.
